summary.para: Provides data for calls to when the feature specified is . Retrieves a value indicating if the specified codec configuration support parameters are supported for the provided HEVC encoding configuration or retrieves the supported configuration for H.264 encoding.
In multi-adapter operation, this indicates which physical adapter of the device this operation applies to.
A member of the enumeration specifying the codec for which rate control mode support is being queried.
A structure specifying the profile for which intra refresh mode support is being queried.
Receives a boolean value indicating if the specified configuration parameters are supported for the specified codec.
A structure. For HEVC, the caller populates this structure with the desired encoder configuration. For H.264, the CheckFeatureSupport call populates the structure with the supported configuration.
